Verses: 1 orepile Isravel Puththirarode Pannikkonda Udanbadikkaiyai Allaamal, Movaabin Dhesaththile Avargalode Udanbadikkaipannik Karththar Mosekkuk Kattalaiyitta Vaarththaigal Ivaigale.
2 mose Isravelar Ellaaraiyum Varavazhaiththu, Avargalai Nokki: Egipthudhesaththil Ungal Kangalukku Munbaagap Paarvonukkum Avanudaiya Ellaa Oozhiyakkaararukkum Avanudaiya Dhesamuzhuvadharkum,
3 karththar Seydha Periya Sodhanaigalaiyum, Periya Adaiyaalangalaiyum, Arpudhangalaiyum Kannaara Gkandeerale.
4 aagilum Karththar Ungalukku Unaraththakka Irudhayaththaiyum, Kaanaththakka Kangalaiyum, Ketkaththakka Kaadhugalaiyum Innaalvaraikkum Kodukkavillai.

5 karththaraagiya Naan Ungal Dhevan Endru Neengal Arindhukollumbadikku, Naan Naarpadhu Varusham Ungalai Vanaandharaththil Nadaththinen; Ungalmel Irundha Vasthiram Pazhaiyadhaaip Pogavum Illai, Ungal Kaalilirundha Paadharatchaigal Pazhaiyadhaaip Pogavum Illai.
6 neengal Appam Saappidavum Illai, Thiraatcharasamum Madhuvum Kudikkavum Illai Endraar.
7 neengal Ivvidaththukku Vandhapodhu, Esponin Raajaavaagiya Seekonum, Paasaanin Raajaavaagiya Ogum Nammode Yuththanjeyyap Purappattargal; Naam Avargalai Muriya Adiththu,
8 avargaludaiya Dhesaththaip Pidiththu, Adhai Roobaniyarukkum Kaaththiyarukkum Manaaseyin Paadhik Koththiraththirkum Sudhandharamaagak Koduththom.
9 ippozhudhum Neengal Seyvadhellaam Ungalukku Vaaikkumbadikku, Indha Udanbadikkaiyin Vaarththaigalaik Kaikkondu, Avaigalinbadi Seyveegalaaga.

10 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuch Sonnabadiyeyum, Un Pidhaakkalaagiya Aabiragaamukkum Eesaakkukkum Yaakkobukkum Aanaiyittuk Koduththabadiyeyum, Indru Unnaith Thamakku Janamaaga Erpaduththikkollavum, Thaam Unakku Dhevanaayirukkavum,
11 nee Un Thevanaakiya Karththarutaiya Utanpatikkaikkum Indru Avar Unnote Pannukira Avarutaiya Aanaiyurudhikkum Utpatumpatikku,
12 ungal Koththirangalin Thalaivarum Ungal Moopparum Ungal Adhibadhigalum Isravelin Sagala Purusharum,

13 ungal Pillaigalum, Ungal Manaivigalum, Ungal Paalayaththukkullirukkira Ungal Virakukkaaranum, Ungal Thanneerkkaaranumaana Anniyar Ellaarum Indru Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Samugaththil Nirkireergale.
14 naan Ungalodemaaththiram Indha Udanbadikkaiyaiyum Indha Aanaiyaiyum Urudhiyaiyum Pannaamal,
15 indru Inge Nammodekooda Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Samugaththil Nirkiravargalodeyum, Indru Inge Nammode Iraadhavargalodeyumkooda Adhaip Pannugiren.
16 naam Ekipthu Dhesaththil Kudiyirundhadhaiyum, Naam Kadandhuvandha Idangalilirundha Jaadhigalin Naduvil Nadandhuvandhadhaiyum Neengal Arindhirukkireergal.
17 avargaludaiya Aruvaruppugalaiyum, Avargalidaththilirukkira Maramum Kallum Velliyum Ponnumaana Avargaludaiya Narakalaana Dhevargalaiyum Kandirukkireergal.

18 aagaiyaal, Andha Jaadhigalin Dhevargalaich Sevikkap Pogumbadi, Indru Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththaraivittu Agalugira Irudhayamulla Oru Purushanaagilum Sthireeyaagilum Kudumbamaagilum Koththiramaagilum Ungalil Iraadhabadikkum, Nanjaiyum Ettiyaiyum Mulaippikkira Yaadhoru Ver Ungalil Iraadhabadikkum Paarungal.

19 appadippattavan Indha Aanaiyurudhiyin Vaarththaigalaik Kettum, Thaagaththinimiththam Verikkak Kudiththu, Mana Ishtappadi Nadandhaalum Enakkuch Sugamundaayirukkum Endru Than Ullaththaith Thetrikkondaal, Karththar Avanai Mannikkach Siththamaayiraar.

20 appozhudhu Karththarin Kobamum Erichchalum Andha Manidhanmel Pugaiyum; Indhap Pusthagaththil Ezhudhiyirukkira Saabangalellaam Avanmel Thangum; Karththar Avan Perai Vaanaththinkeezh Iraadhabadikkuk Kulaiththuppoduvaar.

21 indha Niyaayappiramaana Pusthagaththil Ezhudhiyirukkira Udanbadikkaiyinudaiya Sagala Saabangalinbadiyum Avanukkuth Theengaaga Karththar Isravel Koththirangal Ellaavatrirkum Avanaip Purambaakkippoduvaar.
22 appozhudhu Ungalukkup Pin Ezhumbum Thalaimuraiyaana Ungal Pillaigalum, Dhooradhesaththilirundhu Varum Anniyarum, Karththar Indha Dhesaththukku Varuviththa Vaadhaigalaiyum Noigalaiyum Kaanumbodhum,

23 karththar Thamadhu Kobaththilum Thamadhu Ukkiraththilum Sodhomaiyum Komoraavaiyum Adhmaraavaiyum Sepoyeemaiyum Kavizhththuppottadhupola, Indha Dhesaththin Nilangalellaam Vidhaippum Vilaivum Yaadhoru Poondin Mulaippumillaadhabadikku, Kandhagaththaalum Uppaalum Erikkappattadhaik Kaanumbodhum,
24 andha Jaadhigalellaam Karththar Indha Dhesaththirku En Ippadich Seydhaar; Indha Magaa Kobam Patriyerindhadharkuk Kaaranam Enna Endru Solluvaargal.
25 adharku: Avargaludaiya Pidhaakkalin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Avargalai Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Purappadappannumbodhu, Avargalode Pannina Udanbadikkaiyai Avargal Vittuppoi,
26 thaangal Ariyaamalum Thangalukku Oru Palanum Alikkaamalum Irukkira Dhevargalaagiya Vere Dhevargalaich Seviththu, Avaigalaip Panindhukondabadiyinaale,
27 karththar Indhap Pusthagaththil Ezhudhiyirukkira Saabangal Ellaavatraiyum Indhath Dhesaththinmel Varappanna Adhinmel Kobam Moondavaraagi,

28 avargalaik Kobaththinaalum Ukkiraththinaalum Magaa Erichchalinaalum Avargaludaiya Dhesaththilirundhu Verode Pidungi, Innaalil Irukkiradhupola, Avargalai Vere Dhesaththil Erindhuvittaar Endru Sollappadum.

29 maraivaanavaigal Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththarukke Uriyavaigal; Velippaduththappattavaigalo, Indha Niyaayappiramaanaththin Vaarththaigalinbadiyellaam Seyyumbadikku, Namakkum Nammudaiya Pillaigalukkum Endrendraikkum Uriyavaigal.
